title: Require absolute draft URI in $schema
description: $schema must be one of the recognised draft URLs (draft-04, draft-06, draft-07, 2019-09, 2020-12). Relative or unrecognised URIs are disallowed.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: Relative metaschema URI
comprehensiveExamples.description: $schema must be an absolute, recognised draft URI.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Right: Absolute metaschema URI
comprehensiveExamples.description: Using an official absolute metaschema URI is correct.

message: Set $schema to a absolute draft URI.
